page.title: 10SERVICES IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: In Woodhall Spa there are many different sorts of small shops. Although most of the shops in the village have changed owners during the last fifty years the majority still deal in the same type of goods as they did at that time.A very wide range of goods are available for a village of this size even though there is no major supermarket.Most of the main banks have sub branches in the village.There are two schools,St.Hughs (private sector)and St.Andrew's(CoE controlled).In Woodhall Spa most of the homes are old.There are two churches,St.Peter's and the Methodist Church,both situated in the middle of the village.
